text: wa'iidha suylt -'ayaha alrasula- ean mdt labathihim fi alkahfi, walays eindak eilm fi dhalik watawqif min allaha, fala tataqadam fih bishay'in, bal qul: allah 'aelam bimadat labathihima, lah ghayb alsamawat wal'ardi, 'absir bih wa'asmaein, 'ay: taejab min kamal basarih wasamieih wa'iihatatih bikuli shay'. lays lilkhalq ahd ghyrh yatawalaa 'umurahum, walays lah sharik fi hukmih waqadayih watashrieihu, subhanah wataealaa
